description: Halushki dumplings are enjoyed much like gnocchi, tossed in a sauce or with toppings like mushrooms and bacon.
name: Halushki Dumplings with Mushrooms & Bacon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the flour and salt together in a large bowl. Make a well in the centre and add the eggs, 115ml of lukewarm water, 75g of melted butter and mix with a wooden spoon to form a dough. Use your hands to mix into a smooth dough ball.
Cut the dough into 8 pieces on a floured work surface and roll each into a long thin string. Cut each string into small rectangles.
Bring a pot of salted water to the boil and cook the dumplings for 2-3 minutes until they float to the top. Drain well.

Heat the rest of the butter in a large pan on medium heat and cook the onion, mushroom, bacon pieces and cracked black pepper for 5-6 minutes. Toss the dumplings into the pan, mix well and serve with sour cream on top.
